description:
Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant, thinking it will help her to quickly get into the entertainment industry. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor...
Source: hulu

titles.title: Idol o Mezase! Minako no Yabou
¡A por el estrellato! La ambición de Carola.
アイドルをめざせ! 美奈子の野望
